New Records: Virat Kohli scored his 49th ODI century, equalling Sachin Tendulkar's record
Ravindra Jadeja recorded career-best ODI figures of 5 for 33
Key Match Events: India won the match by 243 runs
Jadeja dismissed South Africa's top scorer Hein Jansen for 14
Pre-Game Insights: Captain Rohit Sharma won the toss and decided to bat first
Experts predicted India as strong contenders given their home advantage
Post-Match Reflections: Kohli celebrated his milestone with a birthday bash
Jadeja's performance was pivotal in the win
The match highlighted India's dominance in the World Cup
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played in Pune with a crowd of 60,000
Poor air quality in Delhi affected another match between Bangladesh and Sri Lanka
Others: The win extended India's streak to eight consecutive World Cup victories
